```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(usedist)
library(igraph)
source("R/1D_mapper.R")
```

## Noisy Circle

```{r noisy circle, echo=FALSE}
circle.data = data.frame( x= sapply(1:1000, function(x) cos(x)) + rnorm(100, 500, .03), y = sapply(1:1000, function(x) sin(x)) + rnorm(100, 0, 0.03))
circle.dist = dist(circle.data)

plot(circle.data$x, circle.data$y, pch=20)
plot(mapper(circle.data, circle.data$x, circle.dist, 5, 10, "single"))
```

## Noisy Clover

```{r noisy clover, echo=FALSE}
clover.data = data.frame( x= sapply(1:1000, function(x) sin(2*x)*cos(x)) + rnorm(100, 500, .03), y = sapply(1:1000, function(x) sin(2*x)*sin(x)) + rnorm(100, 0, 0.03))
clover.dist = dist(clover.data)

plot(clover.data$x, clover.data$y, pch=20)
plot(mapper(clover.data, clover.data$x, clover.dist, 5, 10, "single"))
```
